text: Ali Institute of Education Lahore is a private Teacher Training institution located in Lahore, Pakistan. It was established in 1992. It was established on the land donated by Syed Muratib Ali family. The Institute offers Diplomas in Education. *1 Year Post Graduate Diploma in Education *1 Year Post Graduate Diploma in Montessori Education *1 Year Post Graduate Diploma in English Language Teaching *1 Year Post Graduate Diploma in ELM *Short Diplomas == References == Category:Universities and colleges in Lahore Category:Private universities and colleges in Punjab, Pakistan Category:Educational institutions established in 2010 Category:Ali family
title: Ali Institute of Education
